posts.title: Frustratingly Difficult Word Search Book
posts.content: Think word searches are too easy? If so then this frustratingly difficult word search book is just for you. This challenging coloring book features a collection of 60 letter collages where each word on the list has been split up and randomly jumbled across the page.

posts.title: Jurassic World LEGO Set
posts.content: Get your adrenaline pumping after stopping a rampaging Indominus Rex from tearing the Jurassic World LEGO set to shreds. Using a state of the art chopper and your moxie, you’ll track, capture, and put this fearsome predator back in his cage.

posts.title: Remote Control Message Helicopter
posts.content: Look no further than the remote control message helicopter when you want a creative way of getting your point across. You’ll be able to customize any message up to twenty words and display it as it hovers up and down at the push of a button.

posts.title: Micro-Adjustable No-Holes Belt
posts.content: Get the perfect fit every time by wearing this micro-adjustable no-holes belt. The ingenious design features a solid buckle that clamps onto the belt at the exact point you need  – making it ideal for those holiday feasts where your waistline expands in a single sitting.

posts.title: Star Wars Candy Holders
posts.content: Trick-or-treaters will be flocking to your house when they see the Star Wars candy holders loaded up with goodies. Each candy holder has been decorated with painstaking detail to resemble the actual movie characters and add a fun touch to any haunted home.

posts.title: Gourmet Parisian Rainbow Macarons
posts.content: Whisk your taste buds off to France by sinking your teeth into one of these delectable gourmet Parisian rainbow macarons. Each box comes filled with 16 colorful and mouth-watering little treats complemented with either a chocolate or natural fruit ganache filling.

posts.title: Pool Arcade Basketball
posts.content: Transform your pool into an aquatic b-ball court with the pool arcade basketball. The inflatable hoop sets up in mere minutes and features a colorful backboard and side walls to prevent the shots from flying away as you try to outscore your opponent.

posts.title: T-Rex Taco Holder
posts.content: Make Taco Tuesday even more fun for everyone by serving up some tasty tacos on this T-Rex taco holder. Crafted from durable and food-safe ABS plastic, this ferocious beast comes with a specially designed crevice ideal for hard shell tacos.

posts.title: Rubber Duckie Tea Infuser
posts.content: You’ll always have a friend to talk to while you sip your tea when you prepare it using this rubber duckie tea infuser. After loading it with coarse tea leaves, the duckie joyfully floats about as the tea dissolves into the piping hot cup of water.

posts.title: Oh The Places You’ll Eff Up Parody Book
posts.content: Take a whimsical ride through the many mistakes you’re bound to make in life by perusing through the pages of the “Oh The Places You’ll Eff Up” parody book. It’s filled with page after page of clever rhymes depicting life’s many less than graceful moments.

posts.title: Dimmable Motion Activated Light
posts.content: Illuminate your humble abode’s darkest spots without any fuss using this dimmable motion activated light. Once installed, it automatically lights up when it senses motion and features an adjustable automatic shut off timer you can set between 30 seconds to 10 minutes.

posts.title: Illuminated Globe
posts.content: Turn your study aid into a unique and educational night light by flicking on the illuminated globe. Once the globe is lit, the planet’s physical geography such as mountain ranges and underwater topography are revealed in stunning detail.
